channel.title: ★ Xymo-scape 718 Rsps ★ [24/7]
channel.description:
[CENTER][SIZE=5][FONT=Arial Black][COLOR="#FF0000"]Xymo-scape 718 RsPs[/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE][/CENTER]
Xymo-scape is a Runescape Private Server aimed at entertainment. Hosted and xChaos coded By Kyle, for players, Xymo-scape aims to capture a flawless gameplay experience for it's players with features that the community wants, rather than the development team. Join the fun now and take a step into the world of Xymo-scape - the #1 Runescape Private Server of 2013/2014
24/7 online and 100% uptime except if there is errors.
[CENTER]Temp--[URL=http://"http://xymoscape718.moreforum.com/"]Forums[/URL]--Temp --[URL=http://"http://www.mediafire.com/download/xczrql55bar0zxv/Xymo-scape.jar"]Download client[/URL]--[/CENTER]
[LEFT][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4][COLOR="#FF0000"]Features:-[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/LEFT] [COLOR="#FF0000"]-Fully working Nex with Minions -Dicing -Amazing Donor benefits(donorzone,yell,Dicing,etc) -Added dicezone for dicers -fixed mithril seeds -Added trollinvasion minigame! -Added SEXY CAPE with good bonuses -fixed drops at atleast every boss and added missing drops -New and awesome! -90% farming added(in pictures) -Mini Tutorial to Help you get started -Fully Working Revenants -More than 3 easy ways to gain money (thieving, pkp, skiller points) -added new boss (blink) -Added and fixed jadinko -fixed frosts -fixed gano spawn! -dupe glitches has been fixed -sexier starters! -Shooting Star(thanks to santa hat) -Added a nice but generic dungeoneering -Fully Working Pest Control -Working Castle wars -Working Duel Arena(staking) -AMAZING skilling zone, Skilling is just as good money as pvm and pking to keep skillers happy! -Easier xp rate, Not so easy that you get 99's in everything but reasonable -25 working skills(dung,hunter,summoning included!) -Full Gwd with working boss's/minions/objects -Working Corp -Fixed corp safespots -Dag kings -Stable economy -Fixed alot of black screen places(kbd) -Fixed fire cape glitch(qbd glitch) -Kbd -KQ -Skiller points , for every level u get -Full Farming -Construction house and saved furnitures -Comp cape reqs and animation -Crystal key -Crystal Chest money rewards -Npc gambler -New teleports -Fixed nex drops , hits and hitpoints and NULLs -5 boss pages -Working minigames -Global trivia for trivia points -Dicers shop -Veteran rank added -Forum mod fixed -all crowns fixed -Tormented Demons -Frost Dragons -Amazing pkp Shop to encourage pkers -HIGHSCORES -Fully working slayer(Feature that allows you to ask the master and get where your task is located) -Funpk -Fixed bork scene and teleport -Fixed bork time "-350000000000000" minute thing -in-game highscores -In-game rares closet -stable econamy and competitve -Active owner, daily updates, very kind and not serious at all -Actual Difficulty(agility pipe at taverly actually takes 80 agility etc) -Fixed squeal of fortune rewards.. no lamps except for 3 -Easter Event (ready but not gonna be launched til easter -Fixed rest animations -Added 1b Token for currency -Added ;;rules command -Added "topic" command (;;topic 1) opens topic 1 -Added alot of moneymaking guides -Friendly players -Staff needed (no staffhunt please) -Added new interface on login -Download client has been added to our temp forums -All the donations will be only for "vps" and "domain" -Advertising is apperciated and will be rewarded with staff! -Added new ;;players interface -Added playeronline on report button -Fixed reporting in-game[/COLOR]
[LEFT][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4][COLOR="#FF0000"]Future Updates:-[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/LEFT] [COLOR="#FF0000"]-100% farming -New donor zone -New donor shop -New donor features/commands -New skiller shop -new trivia shop -100% changing all npcs names -Fixing pkranks(90% finished) -100% construction -adding atleast 75% rs dungeoneering -100% thieiving (more than stalls) -100% pins with interface -100% moneypouch being able to buy/sell/use from shop! -adding VIP -Zombies minigame(90% finished) -Adding "donator shop" which any player can see/buy from ex(donator status from donator tickets) -Any suggest will be atleast "started" within 24 hours -Fixing all duel arena glitches/bugs -Pest control rewards , and some bugs -Grand exchange (MAYBE) (til i fix all its glitches) -Zombie monsters (earn tokens) (adding shops) -Adding "hit and earn game" -Adding new background -Fixing Sof background[/COLOR]

item.title: ★ Xymo-scape 718 Rsps ★ [24/7]
item.dc:creator: @saddam301 saddam301
item.description:
@saddam301 wrote:

[CENTER][SIZE=5][FONT=Arial Black][COLOR="#FF0000"]Xymo-scape 718 RsPs[/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE][/CENTER]

Xymo-scape is a Runescape Private Server aimed at entertainment. Hosted and xChaos coded By Kyle, for players, Xymo-scape aims to capture a flawless gameplay experience for it’s players with features that the community wants, rather than the development team. Join the fun now and take a step into the world of Xymo-scape - the #1 Runescape Private Server of 2013/2014

24/7 online and 100% uptime except if there is errors.

[CENTER]Temp–[URL=http://“http://xymoscape718.moreforum.com/”]Forums[/URL]–Temp
–[URL=http://“http://www.mediafire.com/download/xczrql55bar0zxv/Xymo-scape.jar”]Download client[/URL]–[/CENTER]

[LEFT][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4][COLOR="#FF0000"]Features:-[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/LEFT]
[COLOR="#FF0000"]-Fully working Nex with Minions
-Dicing
-Amazing Donor benefits(donorzone,yell,Dicing,etc)
-Added dicezone for dicers
-fixed mithril seeds
-Added trollinvasion minigame!
-Added SEXY CAPE with good bonuses
-fixed drops at atleast every boss and added missing drops
-New and awesome!
-90% farming added(in pictures)
-Mini Tutorial to Help you get started
-Fully Working Revenants
-More than 3 easy ways to gain money (thieving, pkp, skiller points)
-added new boss (blink)
-Added and fixed jadinko
-fixed frosts
-fixed gano spawn!
-dupe glitches has been fixed
-sexier starters!
-Shooting Star(thanks to santa hat)
-Added a nice but generic dungeoneering
-Fully Working Pest Control
-Working Castle wars
-Working Duel Arena(staking)
-AMAZING skilling zone, Skilling is just as good money as pvm and pking to keep skillers happy!
-Easier xp rate, Not so easy that you get 99’s in everything but reasonable
-25 working skills(dung,hunter,summoning included!)
-Full Gwd with working boss’s/minions/objects
-Working Corp
-Fixed corp safespots
-Dag kings
-Stable economy
-Fixed alot of black screen places(kbd)
-Fixed fire cape glitch(qbd glitch)
-Kbd
-KQ
-Skiller points , for every level u get
-Full Farming
-Construction house and saved furnitures
-Comp cape reqs and animation
-Crystal key
-Crystal Chest money rewards
-Npc gambler
-New teleports
-Fixed nex drops , hits and hitpoints and NULLs
-5 boss pages
-Working minigames
-Global trivia for trivia points
-Dicers shop
-Veteran rank added
-Forum mod fixed
-all crowns fixed
-Tormented Demons
-Frost Dragons
-Amazing pkp Shop to encourage pkers
-HIGHSCORES
-Fully working slayer(Feature that allows you to ask the master and get where your task is located)
-Funpk
-Fixed bork scene and teleport
-Fixed bork time “-350000000000000” minute thing
-in-game highscores
-In-game rares closet
-stable econamy and competitve
-Active owner, daily updates, very kind and not serious at all
-Actual Difficulty(agility pipe at taverly actually takes 80 agility etc)
-Fixed squeal of fortune rewards… no lamps except for 3
-Easter Event (ready but not gonna be launched til easter
-Fixed rest animations
-Added 1b Token for currency
-Added ;;rules command
-Added “topic” command (;;topic 1) opens topic 1
-Added alot of moneymaking guides
-Friendly players
-Staff needed (no staffhunt please)
-Added new interface on login
-Download client has been added to our temp forums
-All the donations will be only for “vps” and “domain”
-Advertising is apperciated and will be rewarded with staff!
-Added new ;;players interface
-Added playeronline on report button
-Fixed reporting in-game[/COLOR]

[LEFT][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4][COLOR="#FF0000"]Future Updates:-[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/LEFT]
[COLOR="#FF0000"]-100% farming
-New donor zone
-New donor shop
-New donor features/commands
-New skiller shop
-new trivia shop
-100% changing all npcs names
-Fixing pkranks(90% finished)
-100% construction
-adding atleast 75% rs dungeoneering
-100% thieiving (more than stalls)
-100% pins with interface
-100% moneypouch being able to buy/sell/use from shop!
-adding VIP
-Zombies minigame(90% finished)
-Adding “donator shop” which any player can see/buy from ex(donator status from donator tickets)
-Any suggest will be atleast “started” within 24 hours
-Fixing all duel arena glitches/bugs
-Pest control rewards , and some bugs
-Grand exchange (MAYBE) (til i fix all its glitches)
-Zombie monsters (earn tokens) (adding shops)
-Adding “hit and earn game”
-Adding new background
-Fixing Sof background[/COLOR]

[/CENTER]
